summary: Replaces Nightingale original texture with one resembling The Dark Knight.
descriptionHtml:
This is a WIP

This replaces the original Nightingale texture. It is not intended to be an exact replica of the dark knight suit, but similar to it and fit the nightingale mesh at the same time. 

All you have to do is extract the data folder into your Skyrim folder.

 I plan on making this set standalone and craftable at a forge. I kind of rushed on this since I wanted to release it near the premier of The Dark Knight Rises. Anyways, I hope you enjoy it. Feel free to leave your suggestions in the comments. Helmet is up! You may experience some hair clipping if you have long hair like me. I would advise using very short hair for better results. There is still a lot of work to be done and I hope you enjoy it as it is now. Standalone is uh... well... I don\'t know. I decided to pursue an original idea. YOU MAY EDIT THIS MOD!!! just credit me and the cast & crew behind the films.
[youtube]qinhMnWS4k4[/youtube]
author: xseph1rothx

files.name: Dark Knight Suit now with helmet
